product_name: Twin Six The Argyle Bike Jersey - Men's
long_description: Just slip on The Argyle Bike Jersey for men from Twin Six and feel how soft it is. It'll put such a smile on your face that you'll rev up to top speed in no time. Supersoft polyester wicks away perspiration and dries quickly, so you stay cool and collected on race day. Full-front hidden zipper makes on/off and venting a breeze. 3 back pockets stow energy snacks and gear. Twin Six The Argyle Bike Jersey for men is made in the U.S.A.
short_description: Just slip on The Argyle Bike Jersey for men from Twin Six and feel how soft it is. It'll put such a smile on your face that you'll rev up to top speed in no time.
